titleStmt.title: The copy of a letter sent from an English gentleman, lately become a Catholike beyond the seas, to his Protestant friend in England in answere to some points, wherin his opinion was required, concerning the present busines of the Palatinate, & marriage with Spayne : and also declaring his reasons for the change of his religion.
titleStmt.author: Crynes, N.

notesStmt.note: Place of imprint and name of publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: odd number pages filmed first, followed by even number pages.
Reproduction of original in the St. John's College (University of Oxford). Library.
